languages.text: "Покушение на Адептус Арбитес. Приговор: смерть. Дальнейший допрос не имеет смысла, Вольный Торговец".
"Conspiracy to murder members of the Adeptus Arbites. The sentence is death. Further questioning would be pointless, Rogue Trader."
languages.original_text: "Покушение на Адептус Арбитес. Приговор: смерть. Дальнейший допрос не имеет смысла, Вольный Торговец".

languages.text: «Conspiración para asesinar a miembros del Adeptus Arbites. La sentencia es la muerte. No es necesario continuar con el interrogatorio, Comerciante».
languages.original_text: "Conspiracy to murder members of the Adeptus Arbites. The sentence is death. Further questioning would be pointless, Rogue Trader."

traits.locale_text: «Conspiración para asesinar a miembros del Adeptus Arbites. La sentencia es la muerte. No es necesario continuar con el interrogatorio, Comerciante».

languages.text: “谋杀法务部成员，理当判处死刑。再问下去也没什么意义了，行商浪人。”
languages.original_text: "Conspiracy to murder members of the Adeptus Arbites. The sentence is death. Further questioning would be pointless, Rogue Trader."

traits.locale_text: “谋杀法务部成员，理当判处死刑。再问下去也没什么意义了，行商浪人。”

languages.text: 「高等裁定局のメンバーを殺害するという陰謀は、死刑に値します。ローグトレーダー、さらなる質問は意味がありません」
languages.original_text: "Conspiracy to murder members of the Adeptus Arbites. The sentence is death. Further questioning would be pointless, Rogue Trader."

traits.locale_text: 「高等裁定局のメンバーを殺害するという陰謀は、死刑に値します。ローグトレーダー、さらなる質問は意味がありません」

languages.text: « Une conspiration visant à assassiner des membres de l'Adeptus Arbites ? Un crime passible de la peine capitale. Inutile de pousser davantage notre interrogatoire, {mf|libre-marchand|libre-marchande}. »
languages.original_text: "Conspiracy to murder members of the Adeptus Arbites. The sentence is death. Further questioning would be pointless, Rogue Trader."

traits.locale_text: « Une conspiration visant à assassiner des membres de l'Adeptus Arbites ? Un crime passible de la peine capitale. Inutile de pousser davantage notre interrogatoire, {mf|libre-marchand|libre-marchande}. »

languages.text: "Adeptus Arbites mensuplarına yönelik suikast girişimi. Cezası ölümdür. Sorgulamayı sürdürmek anlamsız Hür Tacir."
languages.original_text: "Conspiracy to murder members of the Adeptus Arbites. The sentence is death. Further questioning would be pointless, Rogue Trader."

traits.locale_text: "Adeptus Arbites mensuplarına yönelik suikast girişimi. Cezası ölümdür. Sorgulamayı sürdürmek anlamsız Hür Tacir."

languages.text: "Ein Mordkomplott gegen Mitglieder des Adeptus Arbites. Das Urteil lautet Tod. Jedes weitere Verhör wäre sinnlos, {mf|Freihändler|Freihändlerin}."
languages.original_text: "Conspiracy to murder members of the Adeptus Arbites. The sentence is death. Further questioning would be pointless, Rogue Trader."

traits.locale_text: "Ein Mordkomplott gegen Mitglieder des Adeptus Arbites. Das Urteil lautet Tod. Jedes weitere Verhör wäre sinnlos, {mf|Freihändler|Freihändlerin}."
